title: Copywriter wanted!
job_overview:
Creative writing and rewriting agency is looking for copywriters.
Junior level is welcome and best salaries on the market.
Salary starts from 12000/week(2-4 hours/day, from Monday to Friday).
Weekly payment.
Salary increase(depending on KPI) each month.

First contact through email:
Upgrade to see actual info

Be sure to send examples of your works!
